channel.title: Rewards on Fast Pool
channel.description: Recent content in Rewards on Fast Pool

item.title: Cycle #31
item.description: Cycle #31 was the first cycle where rewards were paid in xBTC to members that set their settings to xBTC at https://pool.friedger.de/members For cycle #31, Friedger Pool received 1.52453855 BTC rewards. We wrapped these to xBTC (-0.2% wrapping fee) and distributed xBTC to 7 members. Remaining rewards were swapped via Alex Go in 2 txs: https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x207d9e6e6e892b59d7a288a0cad48d2c1b6128cb761e78f666ac8398c4f8de37?chain=mainnet https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x6fbd9b8dff6cecfbc60ae42fee64f72afe7a78ecd2146cc7c8f8774e0894bc3d?chain=mainnet The exchange rate was 2887 sats/stx. 7 members received a total of 0.

item.title: Cycle #32
item.description: May 8th, 2022 1.60294115 BTC were transferred (fees: 68,017sats) and converted to 1.599 xBTC (fees: 0.00320453) 1.599 xBTC were split into payouts a) for Boombox Edition #10 b) xBTC receivers and c) the remaining members. xBTC was converted to STX at 2447. This results to the following rewards: a) 107 Boombox owners received in total 545.939308 STX (1,335,913 sats) b) 9 xBTC receivers shared 0.00841761 xBTC c) 1642 members would have received in total 64,455.

item.title: Cycle #33
item.description: Cycle #33 finished at block During the cycle the price of BTC/USD, and many other crypto currencies went down. Therefore, we exchanged stacking rewards (0.56801045 BTC) half way through. Transferred To wrapped: 0.56801045BTC (0.57068295 BTC - 0.00267250 BTC fees) .. and to friedgerpool.btc 0.5669 xBTC (tx) Converted on Alex: 0.5669 xBTC → 30,618.234 STX (1851 sats/stx) (tx) The wrapping happened at the end of the cycle: Transferred to wrapped 0.64100222 xBTC ...and to friedgerpool.

item.title: Cycle #34
item.description: Cycle #34 finished at block 62793 Total rewards 1.16925205 BTC

item.title: Cycle #35
item.description: Cycle #35 ended at block 64656. From the Friedger Pool dashboard on stacksonchain you can see that the total rewards received were 1.16919895 BTC the total rewards distributed were 59,598.244130 STX and 0.00707862 xBTC DetailsIn one transactions rewards for Friedger Pool and the Stacks Advocate Pool have been wrapped. This includes a 0.2% fee. (For details of the wrap check the Bitcoin txs of address 3NoFby5gyf3xXWjSKwcHmr4x6KijvHoiZS.) This results in 1.

item.title: Cycle #36
item.description: Last Minute Action15 minutes before the start of cycle #36, we managed to add another 46 addresses and around 400k STX to the pool. Reward DistributionRewards received: 1.63641730 BTC wrapped into 1.63314446 xBTC Total number of members: 1826 17 members received 0.00707435 xBTC. The remaining 1.62607 xBTC were converted to 81,551.338154 STX at a rate of 1993 sats/stx. 98 Boombox owners at block #66497 received 320.846062 STX. The remaining 1711 members received 81,268.

item.title: Cycle #37
item.description: Details can be verified e.g. on the stacks on chain dashboard: https://stacksonchain.com/dashboards/Friedger-Pool/21 First, the total stacking rewards of 1.05152455 BTC were wrapped to 1.04874993 xbtc rewards including a 0.2% wrapping fee by wrapped.com: https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0xd733546ba4aed7ce46ad70a9b6fdfe1043391bcf9ea943fee155c8f2c7e69c71?chain=mainnet Second, the 1.04875000 xBTC rewards were swapped to 53,536.106783 STX on alex go. That is a rate of 1959 sats/stx: https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x0147c5515c0c13a8dba086aa39f66f92163a8b0fc64d222a8ad90737f41203ec?chain=mainnet 17 members received rewards in xBTC (total of 0.00580174 xBTC), 1530 members received rewards in STX (total of 53,239.

item.title: Cycle #38
item.description: We received 1.0575175 BTC stacking rewards in cycle #38. After fees, we had 1.05477437 xBTC. We swapped 1.04458 xBTC for 50,539.069593 STX at Alex, that is a rate of 2066 sats/stx. We distributed 0.01019145 xBTC to members who chose to receive xBTC. 644.297925 STX to Boombox #13 holders. 49,916.346767 STX to the remaining pool members. Overall that is a theoretical yield of 0.31% for one cycle.

item.title: Cycle #39
item.description: We received 1.28520088 xBTC wrapped rewards. One part was converted to 62,782.608161 STX and distributed to 1259 members. The remaining 0.01196958 xBTC were distributed to 20 members. Th rewards were 0.41% of the total stacked stx for cycle #39.

item.title: Cycle #40
item.description: Stacking rewards of 1.32165105 BTC have beend wrapped to 1.31835429 xBTC. 1.30504 xBTC were swapped to 70,044.123526 STX at a rate of 1863 sats/stx. The theoretical total rewards are therefore 70,765.125603 STX. 743.732666 STX were sent to 120 Boombox owners. 69,304.528376 STX were sent to 1713 members. 0.013355186 xBTC (=716.864536 STX) sent to 28 members. This time, we sent the wrong STX amounts to the pool address: 700.743967 STX (for boomboxes) and 69,349.

item.title: Cycle #41
item.description: 1.29705810 BTC in stacking rewards were wrapped to 1.29373355 xBTC. These were converted to 73,038.660774 STX on alexgo. That is a rate of 1771 sats/stx. 72,192.744519 STX to 1594 members and 0.01520004 xBTC (858.274655 STX) to 30 members were distributed. That is a theoretical total of 73,051.019198 STX (0.41% of total stacked STX).

item.title: Cycle #42
item.description: Rewards of 0.89986085 BTC have been wrapped to 0.89749191 xBTC and exchanged at a rate of 1699 sats/STX. That is a theoretical total of 52.824,715126 STX. 0.01134697 xBTC have been distributed to 30 members. 0.88614000 xBTC have been distributed to 1519 members (51,614.113829 STX) and 104 Boombox owners (542.739136 STX). Note, the Boombox 15th Edition was finalized before the start of the cycle #42 through a job contract, not through boom-admin-v3.

item.title: Cycle #43
item.description: We received 0.84728440 BTC in stacking rewards. The total was transferred to the wrapping service (0.84677031 plus 0.00051409 BTC in fees) and wrapped to 0.84507677 xBTC. 30 members received total rewards of 0.00835798 xBTC. 1495 members received total rewards of 50,557.026446 STX (we converted 0.83672 xBTC to 50,543.030305 STX at rate of 1655 sats/stx). The theoretical total was 51,062.040483 STX (0.29%)

item.title: Cycle #44
item.description: Update 27.10.2022: The conversion rate from xBTC to STX was wrongly calculated. We used the minimum STX amount of 57,160.867228, not the actual amount of 59,233.832647. Therefore, we distributed another round of rewards for pool members that received rewards in STX. Pool members receiving rewards in xBTC have received the correct amount in the first batch of distribution. The two xBTC transactions failed as expected. Boombox holders receive the correct amount in one transaction.

item.title: Cycle #45
item.description: Rewards for cycle #45 are 0.88500460 BTC These have been send to wrapped (0.88434621 BTC + 65,839 sats fees) to 0.88257752 xBTC, including wrapping fee of 0.2%. xBTC has been distributed as 0.00790222 xBTC to 33 members 57506.594130 STX (0.87467530 xbtc converted) to 1826 members At an exchange rate of 1521 sats/stx, the theoretical rewards are 58,026.135437 STX which is 0.30% of the locked STX for cycle #45.

item.title: Cycle #46
item.description: Rewards received 0.75409890 BTC, wrapped to 0.75191552 xBTC. xBTC was swapped at 1464 sats/stx (https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x36af1eb31e9505f10965124dd9e04d5021074bdffe910b15fcae5d158be8e96c?chain=mainnet) Rewards were distributed as 0.00666964 xBTC to 34 pool members, 50,427.265382 STX to 1836 pool members, 477.508144 STX to 92 Boombox holders at block 84709.

item.title: Cycle #47
item.description: 0.85475 BTC rewards were wrapped to 0.85248183 xBTC. (0.85419021 BTC + 55,979 sats network fee - 0.2% wrapping fees) 33 members received 0.00719718 xBTC 1839 members received 47,354.882283 STX (converted at an exchange rate of 1785 sats/stx) The theoretical total distribution is 47,758.085714 STX or 0.26% of total stacked amount.

item.title: Cycle #48
item.description: Rewards: 1.03704541 BTC - 70,104 sats fees = 1.03634437 to wrap Wrapped rewards: 1.03427169 xBTC (after wrapping fees of 0.2%) 30 members received 0.00871450 xBTC 1692 members received 72,252.997897 STX, exchanged at 1414 sats/stx 83 Boombox owners (at block height 88495) received 275.799256 STX Achieved APY in 2022This is the last payout of the year. Looking back, the total achieved APY with a 12-cycle locking period and 1 cool down cycle at cycle #37 is: 8.

item.title: Cycle #49
item.description: Rewards received: 0.96931329 BTC 0.96856597 BTC (fees: 74732 sats) have been wrapped to 0.96662884 xBTC (fees: 0.2%) 30 members have received 0.00740363 xBTC. 1666 members have received 72,176.464429 STX (converted at 1329).

item.title: Cycle #50
item.description: Total rewards 1.01771931 BTC wrapped into 1.01496432 xBTC (1.01699831 converted; 0.00072100 transfer fee; 0.2% wrapping fee) These were distributed as follows: 25 pool members received 0.00454997 xBTC 1750 pool members received 80,408.970997 STX 76 Boomboxes received 295.050849 STX The exchange rate was 1252 sats/stx The theoretical payout in STX was 81,067.437699 STX. That is 0.4% of the total stacked STX. The rewards where transferred to the payout account in several transactions due to a wrong comma position when calculating the exchange rate and due to a missing boundary for cycle #50 (some members of cycle #51 where included in the calculations.

item.title: Cycle #51
item.description: We received rewards of 0.92209339 BTC These were wrapped with network fees of 0.00070921 BTC to 0.91954142 xBTC (= 0.92138418 BTC - 0.2% wrapping fee). 26 pool members received 0.00443631 xBTC 1583 pool members received 68,745.217667 STX 76 Boombox owners at block height 94117 received 265.440929 STX 1 pool member was a contract and received 1.792947 STX (see https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0xa239f5b50cc5d14c3cd4950c90f592ad07d582b86e5b63a56ace6e5139ccedef?chain=mainnet ) The theoretical total rewards were 69,347.015082 STX which corresponds to 0.

item.title: Cycle #53
item.description: We received 1.60010304 BTC stacking rewards. These were wrapped after btc network fees (0.00191252 BTC) and wrapping fees (0.2%) into 1.59499178 xBTC. xBTC was exchanged to STX at a rate of 3594 sats/stx. The rewards were distributed as follows: 26 members received a total of 0.00595096 xBTC 1525 pool members received a total of 44,041.553469 STX 76 Boombox owners at block height #97376 received a total of 172.158896 STX

item.title: Cycle #54
item.description: Total rewards: 3,38715798 BTC wrapped in 4 transactions to 3,36248156 xBTC (see below) Swapped 3,35709942 xBTC to 96,346.083329 STX and distributed the rewards to 1700 members, 76 Boombox owners and 3 contracts. Distributed as xBTC to 27 members: 0.00509150 (wrongly sent 0.00538214) 4 Wrapping and Swapping Transactions1) Sent 1.00672315 BTC including fees. 0.998 xBTC / 35,609.223111 STX = 2802 (https://explorer.stacks.co/txid/0x277d9af6040d31e981555cc565a1d0d6825f26ca099bf560facfc2debdd462fb?chain=mainnet) 2) Sent 1.00530790 BTC including fees. 0.998 xBTC / 28,936.

item.title: Cycle #55
item.description: The received rewards of 3.4467113 BTC were wrapped to 3.43094748 xBTC. See below for details of wrapping and swapping. 29 pool members received 0.00656676 xBTC 1413 pool members recived 37,541.767155 STX 76 Boombox owners at block #100597 received 2 city coin contracts received 36,583.295214 STX (NYC) and 24,130.341569 STX (MIA). A theoretical total of 98,618.783558 STX (0.24%). Wrapping and Exchange txs94ed45374241797c4dc253cd9cf1f8b5969f08cad7f962dfbbd104ed1f6bed36 wrapped: 1 BTC fees: 0.00277645 BTC received: 0.998 xBTC

item.title: Cycle #56
item.description: Wrapped rewards 0.3369142212 xBTC Converted to 11,771.882395 STX All 164 pool members have total received rewards of 11,771.882319 STX (0.34%). Distribution in xBTC will be available in the next cycles.

item.title: Cycle #57
item.description: According to Stacks on Chain’s Fast Pool dashboard, Fast Pool received 0.35939700 BTC. However, the balance was 0.35908130. The difference of 31570 sats were the network fees for reward distribution of cycle #56. For this cycle, fees of 0.00243344 BTC are paid from the rewards of cycle #57 directly. The amount of 0.35664786 BTC (rewards - fees) were wrapped to 0.35593456 BTC. The wrapped rewards were swapped to 13,985.869562 STX at 2545 sats/stx one block after the activation of Stacks 2.

item.title: Cycle #58 (Proof of Burn)
item.description: Due to an issue in Stacks 2.2, stacking was disabled with the activation of Stacks 2.3. The means no pool during cycle #58, no action required. We just need to wait for Stacks 2.4

item.title: Cycle #59 (Proof of Burn)
item.description: Due to an issue in Stacks 2.2, stacking was disabled with the activation of Stacks 2.3. The means no pool during cycle #59, no action required. We just need to wait for Stacks 2.4 that was activated on May 27th, 2023. Back to stacking for cycle #60.

item.title: Cycle #60
item.description: For cycle #60, we had 370 reward slots of which 348 were filled. We received 2.256078 BTC, that were wrapped, swapped and distributed in two parts: 1 BTC (+ 0.005215 BTC transaction fees) into 0.998 xBTC. 0.998 xBTC into 40,305.003364 STX. 10,064.081239 STX were distributed to all pool members but the two City Coin treasuries on June, 8th 2023. 1.24456300 (+ 0.00673415 BTC transaction fees; 0,00043415 BTC taken from rewards of cycle #61 due to replace-by-fee) into 1.

item.title: Cycle #61
item.description: We received 2.20034700 BTC in rewards for cycle #61 These ( minus 0.00043415 BTC replace-by-fees for cycle #60 and minus 0.01313836 BTC transfer fees = 2.18677449 BTC) were converted to 2.18242732 xBTC and swapped to 91,709.649069 STX. The rewards were distributed to 562 pool members and 2 city coin contracts. The rewards are 0.23% of the stacked amount at an exchange rate of 2399 (220034700/91,709.649069).

item.title: Cycle #62
item.description: The total rewards are 1.92135300 BTC. We converted 1 BTC (fees: 0.001811 BTC) to 0.998 xBTC and then swapped it to 44,673.429295 STX on 7th July 2023. We wrapped the remaining rewards of 0.91766368 BTC + 0.00185189 BTC fees to 0.915828353 xBTC and then swapped it to 42,687.432522 STX on 11th July 2023. 0.00002643 BTC are missing. Either they were used for previous cycle replace-by-fee or the rewards table has calculated a wrong value.

item.title: Cycle #63
item.description: We recieved 1.68114300 BTC. The usual wrapping service wrapped.com was not available. Therefore, we used letsexchange.io: 1.67500000 converted to 79,359.498472 STX 29,944.317395 STX were distributed to 783 pool members. The memo says “reward cycle #64 payout”, but it is actually for cycle #63. 49,415.180707 STX were distributed to City Coin stackers (NYC: 29,773.591836 STX and MIA: 19,641.588871 STX). With a total locked amount of 41,287,199.907396 STX the rewards are 0.

item.title: Cycle #64
item.description: We received 1.40316900 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were wrapped to 1.39652180 xBTC: btc transfer tx: https://mempool.space/tx/00c7077e1d1c054cc393349662b3e5439da53a970d3ddfe79f2456c0638fd29e, xbtc mint tx: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xf4ef3ed4c957b2489982c7163ab74624f8e715b9bff0c29135c8c1a3f637e137?chain=mainnet xBTC were swapped to 68,049.011569 STX at a rate of 2052 sats/stx: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xd385f044b4eb0d3d5efcb0caef0ea202e75cbae931ca063fef9624e78ccd8d8c?chain=mainnet 68.049,011142 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 860 pool members.

item.title: Cycle #65
item.description: We received 1.378423 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were swapped to 75,511.50 STX using letsexchange.io at a rate of 1818 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/69bc2d1a7cc183ff46746ba216c4da041f496b2cdedf3293dcdaaf873327d242, stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xfaeb4ab0ad3af02f633e8e6a144a6c397b8e5245b75488489884bddea258ffca?chain=mainnet 75,511.499551 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 921 pool members.

item.title: Cycle #66
item.description: We received 1.63340800 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were wrapped (-0.2%) at wrapped.com and swapped at alexgo to 87,952.050405 STX at an effective rate of 1857 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/e56010df6b0897c01aa1108bac9cf354fe909b247d406c00ea9ab206a0935a67 stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/2a153fa5fef3efa40d388fe965b78cbe12e0fd65f9ab8af4e5d4f2bf41a2c218?chain=mainnet and https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xffac6b6fc3dbfe408b0bf66937bb20500ce2bbb54ae8e2850f424251a97eb2c6?chain=mainnet 87,952.049941 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 925 pool members.

item.title: Cycle #67
item.description: We received 1.16520600 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were wrapped (-0.2%) at wrapped.com and swapped at alexgo to 62,539.984736 STX at an effective rate of 1863 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/019c0ec2cd016b8d95fbb383d900fee6566afa6d9a819d70823e11c1b40d8b88 stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x3a0d5f0f9ea27e9189cbff0df77a07c47461ec7b48ad7b80baa419e9056a3c12?chain=mainnet and https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xf69cdbb2237a8038e7277ce809504479b96d03284c2a4c1518ff151fabd88e45?chain=mainnet 62,539.984267 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 965 pool members.

item.title: Cycle #68
item.description: We received 1.19079700 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to 65,774.50 STX at letsexchange.io at an effective rate of 1810 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/b538a9321a5ab12efc99d0bbc97861ea35aa71a3105bc5974221109f817fe476 stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xf427ea81af1d6ec595a868db04082c92a6a7dd25e2e702f21e943b752d58559f?chain=mainnet and https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x01e92511fb69ca16de525f52b5d028b7b1c21620c3d6dcd8489b880fb2a54e6f?chain=mainnet 65,774.499530 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 978 pool members. The story of exchangeThe transaction fees on Bitcoin went up from 2sats/b to 5sats/b just after I submitted the exchange transaction at 2.99sats/b. So, it took a while until confirmed.

item.title: Cycle #69
item.description: We received 1.35589400 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to 65,242.386638 STX at using wrapped.com and alexgo at an effective rate of 2078 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/0d7c3f5ab9dff961fccf6f79ab18ac05835300277ab3db05db3ef9cf6aed147e sbtc transfer to pool proxy address (fastpool.btc): https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xd2e9d74368a48ef78fff822245f692513d32f9146db46749e532ad21817b9c1d?chain=mainnet swap xBTC to STX: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x1ad54b9dd06b021d3d749e85cf9a45675955d225de5ea1e471b6872b2f18d976?chain=mainnet stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x3808e55f9f4ec1d4208144d5c10837e1f9b98cd61c00b9e834e74ed60cb3b91b?chain=mainnet 65,242.386158 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 998 pool members based on a 45,246,259.113913 stacked STX. Missing 17 Members17 pool members did not received rewards due to a limitation of the distribution scripts to 1000 pool members.

item.title: Cycle #70
item.description: We received 1.20943200 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to 65,139.199900 STX at letsexchange.io at an effective rate of 1856 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/7c946a7f23efb9b880cb7d8b476e0e8ff5a6d6cc4e184bd3a82c2f59a7ab9b01 stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x40a83b21e176a3678bf2d1a5f1656a173b278eca2c0b4cc1e33c3ec0aba1a6cf?chain=mainnet 64,901.035949 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 1010 pool members. 238.163406 STX were distributed to 17 pool members who did not receive their rewards during cycle #69. The rewards for cycle #70 are used because all other pool members received more than they should have.

item.title: Cycle #71
item.description: We received 1.35696200 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to 65,242.386638 STX at using wrapped.com (1.289733364 xbtc; 6,464,400 sats tx fees + 0.2% wrapping fees) and alexgo at an effective rate of X sats/stx: btc transfer from pool: https://mempool.space/tx/20e9f243ea19b540e86f1c7d7e71450c3325ec51cd9e2613682e8df109692fae xBTC transfer to pool proxy address (fastpool.btc): https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xb3d4c5b9b065f2f17e86ba0ee807dd2e76f4007a345599b702ba978e4ad0339d?chain=mainnet swap xBTC to STX: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/82a6f3af927db81221ed4235955bcda75dbc1384e90f00d8bd54714e79876ea8?chain=mainnet stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x709ca63fdde9d4f0d82f08b2b62328a404b662ddcdaf56cd13c7f274c5b7932f?chain=mainnet 71,525.184958 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 1065 pool members based on a 45.

item.title: Cycle #72
item.description: We received 1.33633000 BTC stacking rewards. item.title: Cycle #73
item.description: We received 1.41746000 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to 46,570.249928 STX at using wrapped.com and alexgo at an effective rate of 3044 sats/stx: btc transfer from pool (1.34148490 BTC + 0.07597710 BTC fees): https://mempool.space/tx/d6872724a8a3589290b0f685fb7eef4ab85bed2600dd9bb9ea656cefafb2b1ff xbtc transfer to pool proxy address (fastpool.btc) (1,33880193 xBTC): https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x77ff3eee859347cba0c7cbe73e1f0496d951ee9b36940f032984eb453b430ede?chain=mainnet swap 1.3255 xBTC to STX: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x5d79768c4a9fbf6513a91ef0d2ed5716d3bc038722d7e3d5bff79277d14e1b0a?chain=mainnet stx transfer to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xc050f30cf34a2f5b2f22b35b6d77ff549448209ac30a2e81fcddf541eef3fd89?chain=mainnet xBTC to pool reserve: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0xd34e3256412b97e1d3733a8023c4555a3899800300084ca0c6e67aaa71277cbb?chain=mainnet 46,570.249395 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 1076 pool members based on a 46,593,865.

item.title: Cycle #74
item.description: We received 2.51421144 BTC stacking rewards. Rewards were exchanged to STX at using xlink bridge (aBTC) and alexgo swap at an effective rate of 4075 sats/stx: BTC transfer from pool to proxy address (fastpool.btc) (2.43989094 BTC + 0.07432050 BTC BTC fees): https://mempool.space/tx/f91215aa1657f73d77fdcf632fd951f84ad66f081bfa2b1f184803eaea1362b6 BTC to aBTC swap (X aBTC): https://mempool.space/tx/e6193db3df6d60c038dc5d843f7a30281a1b49e2e8e187bbe47dea08a673095f swap 2.43956594 aBTC to STX: https://explorer.alexlab.co/txid/c3ba603fb7b2e3d49297bf0ccf5e482728770dbbe3b27d9ab6f1a1476ff0447f?chain=mainnet 61,692.52 stx transferred to pool: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/b99e4ad2b1e474ed58c58e30a0c3ee0500d588164e1e3f2be625728ac112b529?chain=mainnet 3240 STX to pool reserve: https://explorer.hiro.so/txid/0x4218cd563a6a852ff5fe12f5f4d58791f420355f76be11a0fe2c5c2306edc5bb?chain=mainnet 61,692.519972 STX were distributed to 2 city coin contracts and 1117 pool members based on 46,591,197.

item.title: Cycle #75
item.description: We have received 5.26166854 BTC as rewards. Hard times to Lock for #75The last cycle ended with network congestions due to slow miners and many transactions from STX20 activity. It was difficult to get all pool members into the next cycle. However, we managed to lock 43m STX. Some pools missed their final commit transaction and had to skip the cycle. Thanks to our self-service feature, we could lock early and try to add more members while new miners tried to clear the mempool.

item.title: Cycle #76
item.description: We have received 2.66135200 BTC as rewards. Dust transactionsThere are many dust rewards of 200 sats from F2Pool bitcoin miner. We started to ignore these utxos because consolidating them is more expensive then their value. That means that a few sats will rest in the pox reward address. For this cycle, there were 40 transactions of 200 sats. This is something to keep in mind when doing accounting. Rewards Part 1Once we received 2.

item.title: Cycle #81 - Liquid Stacking with LISA
item.description: We have received 1.306026 BTC as rewards. Liquid Stacking With LISAThis cycle, we started to support the Liquid Stacking service LISA with FAST Pool as part of Lisa’s backend. Lisa used two smart contract as pool members (similar to city coin pool members). Rewards were distributed in a single send-many transaction for Lisa pool members. We encourage pool members to check out the documenation and learn more about liquid stacking at https://docs.

item.title: Cycle #82
item.description: We have received 1.188436 BTC as rewards. Liquid Stacking With LISAThis cycle, the Liquid Stacking service LISA with FAST Pool as part of Lisa’s backend delegated 1,032,192.727200 STX to Fast Pool. Lisa used 5 smart contract as pool members (similar to city coin pool members). Rewards were distributed in aBTC in a single send-many transaction for Lisa pool members. The share of Lisa was 2,231608% of the pool. Based on this number, the rewards were calculated and distributed in two transactions:

item.title: Cycle #83
item.description: We received 5.44506600 BTC as rewards. Delay in Rewards distributionThis cycle we received inscriptions with the rewards. This resulted in change of the distribution flow. See section about aBTC and sBTC below. Liquid Stacking With LISAThis cycle, the Liquid Stacking service LISA with FAST Pool as part of Lisa’s backend delegated 2,737,552.746444 STX to Fast Pool. Lisa used 5 smart contract as pool members (similar to city coin pool members).

item.title: Cycle #84
item.description: We received 2.27728526 BTC as rewards. Security NoticeThe recent incident at Alex showed how important security management is. Note, that Fast Pool does not manage your STX tokens. They stay in your wallet, with your private keys. Fast Pool manages BTC rewards from your stacking and distributes these in STX. We use different private keys, sponsored txs to reduce and other methods to reduce any risks for the rewards. Due to the incident, we did not use aBTC to wrap, instead we used simpleswap.

item.title: Cycle #85
item.description: We received 4.02195000 BTC as rewards. Payout in STX and BTCWe introduced a new distribution flow in BTC on individual requests. The BTC rewards were split proportionally. For cycle 85, we used 1.41758709 BTC for BTC distribution and 2.60436290 BTC for STX distribution. Liquid Stacking With LISAThis cycle, the Liquid Stacking service LISA with FAST Pool as part of Lisa’s backend delegated 4,005,986.256201 STX to Fast Pool. Lisa used 4 smart contract as pool members (similar to city coin pool members).

item.title: Cycle #86
item.description: We received 3.75284 BTC as rewards. Payout in STX and BTC We introduced a distribution flow in BTC on individual requests. The BTC rewards were split proportionally. For cycle 86, we used 1.31639870 BTC for BTC distribution and 2.43644129 BTC for STX distribution. Dust transactions There are many dust rewards of 200 sats and 550 sats. We ignore these utxos because consolidating them is more expensive then their value. That means that a few sats will rest in the pox reward address.

item.title: Cycle 52
item.description: We received 0.90402924 BTC stacking rewards. These were wrapped after btc network fees (0.00168888 BTC) and wrapping fees (0.2%) into 0.90053568 xBTC. xBTC was exchanged to STX at a rate of 1451 sats/stx. The rewards were distributed as follows: 21 members received a total of 0.00270100 xBTC 1540 pool members received a total of 61,641.351023 STX 76 Boombox owners received a total of 235.608236 STX The theoretical total rewards are 62,063.
